name: Team10-LOST
description:
LOST is a game where the player incarnates a boy lost in a colorless world destroyed by pollution. To bring back colors, he needs to awake the four gods by bringing them offerings.  But beware of the Voidlings! A swarm of creatures made of void and detritus.

Gameplay:

Bring the four offerings to the four gods statues to bring back colors!

To help you in your quest and fight voidlings, you have four elemental powers: 

- do dashes at the speed of a hurricane ( press space )

- trow powerful fireballs ( press left mouse button ) 

- spawn huge stone blocks ( press e )

- make bubbles... ( press right mouse button )

But don't use them too much ! They might turn against you and the mistakes of the past will be repeated...

Credits
